Summer Fest

    Summer Fest

    When: 2024-07-04 (Wednesday)
    Venue: Copper Creek Farm
    Address: 1514 Reeves Station Rd SW, Calhoun, GA 30701
    Entrance Fee: $20.56
    Event Website
    Tickets Link: Pay at the gate

    Come out and experience Summer fest at Copper Creek Farm. There's something for everyone with this extensive list of fun activities:

    • Caramel apple barn
    • Sunflower field strolls and picture opportunities
    • The Old General Store
    • Hillbilly splash pad
    • Kids zipline
    • Wagon hayride
    • Pig races
    • Honey bee barn
    • Candy cannon
    • Gem mining
    • Pony rides
    • Watermelon cannon
    • Milking cows
    • Bubbly barn
    • Barnloft slide
    • Steer roping
    • Barn ball boxes
    • Caramel apple barn
    • Giant slide

    And many others!
